application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for Condition 3(Sample of Materials) of planning permission 22/02235/FUL (Demolition of existing dwelling and erection of three storey new dwelling with 2nos rear outbuildings, swimming pool and associated landscaping.)
decision_conditions: The submitted details include amendments to the development approved under planning permission ref: 22/02235/FUL. The shown amendments, which include amendments to the main roof,  cannot be achieved via a discharge of condition application. The original planning permission would need to be formally varied to make such changes.
